Leo.Notes: Leo, "The Lion", is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Notable objects: Messier 95; the Leo Triplet (M66 Group), a small group of spiral galaxies (M65, M66, & NGC 3628).
captions: Leo from a western scientific manuscript, c.1000
The constellation Leo as it can be seen by the naked eye (the bright object in center of the picture is the planet Jupiter).
Greek stamp depicting a mosaical image of the encounter between Hercules and Leo,the Nemean Lion.
